ResourceHeader.Description: Americus (AMER) Magnetometer Station is located in Americus, Kansas, USA.  It is one of the nine magnetometers of the Mid-continent MAgnetoseismic Chain (McMAC).
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: The operation of the Americus fluxgate magnetometer is managed by Emporia State University.

InformationURL.Name: McMAC Americus Station
InformationURL.Description: Information about the McMAC Americus Ground Magnetometer Station
